casebody.data:
American Masons’ and Building Supply Company, Inc. v. Eppoliti, Inc. (13567)

O’Connell, Foti and Hennessy, Js.

Submitted on briefs February 17 decision released April 4, 1995 Steven R. Smart and Karin L. Welch filed a brief for the appellant (defendant). Walter H. Scanlon and Robert A. Ziegler filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
